Students can join Ph.D after this course. Afflicted with Punjabi University, Patiala, Punjab. REFRESHER COURSE FOR SAI COACHES This course is for upgrading coaching knowledge of existing coaches in Sports Authority of India (SAI). No employment scopes with this. FOUR WEEK ALL INDIA REFRESHER COURSE This course is for the non-SAI organizations from all States/UTs.. No employment scopes with this. SIX WEEK COURSE IN SPORTS COACHING This Course is basically for physical education teachers of schools and colleges. POST GRADUATE DIPLOMA IN SPORTS MEDICINE This course is for the doctor (MBBS) who are interested in Sports Medicine and it is of two years duration. Afflicated with Baba Farid University Faridkot Punjab. Doctors later on can join National or other professional teams as team doctors.
